creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: red background with stripes at top 8"; center section has vertical stripes--wide stripe has pattern in turquoise, gold and brown separated by narrow stripes alternating with bright gold or white motifs; bottom section has wide horizontal geometric pattern of mostly diamonds and triangles, followed by plain red section and finally a narrow patterned band at hem; two vertical geometric design strips at ends of lower section, top to hem
title: Skirt
